name: Chainlink Dragon
text: If you resolve a Chain Link of 2 or higher: you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You cannot activate this effect if multiple cards/effects with the same name as this card are in that chain. You can only activate the following 2 effects of "Chainlink Dragon" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Chainlink" card from your Deck to your hand. If you resolve the effect of a card with the same name as a card added by this cardâ€™s effect as Chain Link 3 or higher, while this card is face-up on the field: You can add 1
card from your Deck to your hand.
